summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3006, for the improvement of Alki Avenue from West Spokane Street to the south line of Seashore Park 2nd Addition; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 36195 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
